data.comment: The match has started at Estadio de la Ceramica.
Can Levante get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Celta Vigo's half?
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Levante in the half of Celta Vigo.
Mario Melero Lopez signals a throw-in for Levante, close to Celta Vigo's area.
Celta Vigo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Levante in their own half.
In Villarreal, Ruben Rochina of Levante is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Mario Melero Lopez signals a Levante throw-in in Celta Vigo's half.
In the minute 6, Ball safe as Celta Vigo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Mario Melero Lopez awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 8, Free kick Levante.
Celta Vigo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Mario Melero Lopez signals a free kick to Celta Vigo in their own half.
In the minute 11, Levante's Jose Luis Morales gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Celta Vigo defender.
Celta Vigo's Iago Aspas is on target but unsuccessful.
Levante to take a throw-in in Celta Vigo territory.
In the minute 15, Renato Tapia (Celta Vigo) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Celta Vigo push forward at Estadio de la Ceramica and Renato Tapia gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Levante defence.
Throw-in high up the field for Celta Vigo in Villarreal.
In the minute 16, Throw-in for Celta Vigo at Estadio de la Ceramica.
Celta Vigo's Iago Aspas misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Levante goal kick.
In the minute 19, Throw-in Celta Vigo.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Levante awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 20, Throw-in for Celta Vigo at Estadio de la Ceramica.
Free kick for Celta Vigo in their own half.
Mario Melero Lopez signals a free kick to Levante.
In the minute 23, Corner awarded to Levante.
Free kick for Levante in their own half.
In Villarreal a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 26, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Jose Campana for Levante who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Celta Vigo's Jeison Murillo has been booked in Villarreal.
Goal kick for Celta Vigo at Estadio de la Ceramica.
In the minute 28, Jose Campana returns to the field for Levante after picking up a slight injury.
Can Celta Vigo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Levante's half?
Jose Campana of Levante gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 30, Mario Melero Lopez awards Celta Vigo a goal kick.
Levante awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Celta Vigo in the half of Levante.
In the minute 31, Oscar Duarte for Levante has been booked by Mario Melero Lopez and receives a first yellow card.
In Villarreal, Levante push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Mario Melero Lopez signals a free kick to Levante.
In the minute 36, Levante are coming forward and Jose Campana gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Celta Vigo have a goal kick.
Mario Melero Lopez awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 37, In Villarreal a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Levante close to the penalty box.
Celta Vigo needs to be cautious. Levante have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 38, Throw-in for Celta Vigo in their own half.
Free kick for Levante in the half of Celta Vigo.
The match at Estadio de la Ceramica has been interrupted briefly for a check on Oscar Duarte, who is down injured.
In the minute 40, Levante's Oscar Duarte is back in action after a slight knock.
Levante drives forward and Jose Campana gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Mario Melero Lopez signals a free kick to Celta Vigo in their own half.
In the minute 41, Ball safe as Celta Vigo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Levante in their own half.
Lucas Olaza (Celta Vigo) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 43, Levante push upfield but Mario Melero Lopez quickly pulls them for offside.
Free kick Levante.
Free kick for Levante in the half of Celta Vigo.
In the minute 45, Levante have a dangerous throw-in.
In Villarreal Celta Vigo attack through Denis Suarez. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Villarreal.
In the minute 45, 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Villarreal.
The first-half is over at Estadio de la Ceramica.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 46, Levante have been awarded a penalty in Villarreal...
Mario Melero Lopez signals a free kick to Levante.
Roger Marti converts the penalty to give Levante a 1-0 lead.
In the minute 49, Throw-in high up the field for Celta Vigo in Villarreal.
Throw-in Levante.
In Villarreal Celta Vigo drive forward through Iago Aspas. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 50, Nolito (Celta Vigo) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Celta Vigo have been awarded a corner by Mario Melero Lopez.
Mario Melero Lopez signals a throw-in for Celta Vigo, close to Levante's area.
In the minute 52, Sergio Carreira Vilarino grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Estadio de la Ceramica.
Great play from Denis Suarez to set up the goal.
Levante awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 54, Mario Melero Lopez signals a free kick to Levante in their own half.
In Villarreal a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Levante pushes forward through Jose Campana, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 56, Nolito for Celta Vigo drives towards goal at Estadio de la Ceramica. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Free kick Levante.
Free kick for Celta Vigo in their own half.
In the minute 59, Levante's Jose Luis Morales gets in a shot on goal at Estadio de la Ceramica. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Can Levante get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Celta Vigo's half?
Jose Luis Morales is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 61, Levante make their first substitution with Dani Gomez replacing Gonzalo Melero.
It seems as if Jose Luis Morales is unable to continue. Enis Bardhi replaces him for the home team.
In the minute 62, Celta Vigo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Gabriel Veiga is replacing Nolito for Celta Vigo at Estadio de la Ceramica.
At Estadio de la Ceramica, Levante are penalized for being offside.
Mario Melero Lopez signals a Levante throw-in in Celta Vigo's half.
In the minute 66, Corner awarded to Levante.
Mario Melero Lopez signals a free kick to Celta Vigo in their own half.
Free kick Celta Vigo.
In the minute 68, Levante drive upfield and Dani Gomez gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Celta Vigo defender.
Levante are pushing forward but Enis Bardhi's finish is wide of the goal.
Mario Melero Lopez awards Celta Vigo a goal kick.
In the minute 71, Celta Vigo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Celta Vigo in their own half.
Levante needs to be cautious. Celta Vigo have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 73, It's a goal kick for the home team in Villarreal.
Mario Melero Lopez signals a free kick to Levante in their own half.
Ball safe as Levante is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 74, Free kick for Levante in their own half.
Paco Lopez (Levante) is making a third substitution, with Ruben Vezo replacing Oscar Duarte.
Celta Vigo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Mario Melero Lopez signals a free kick to Celta Vigo.
Free kick in a good position for Celta Vigo!
In the minute 78, Tono is booked for the home team.
In the minute 80, Mario Melero Lopez signals a free kick to Levante in their own half.
Jose Campana of Levante smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Throw-in for Celta Vigo in the half of Levante.
In the minute 84, Throw-in for Celta Vigo at Estadio de la Ceramica.
In the minute 85, Levante to take a throw-in in Celta Vigo territory.
Throw-in Levante.
Carlos Clerc is replacing Tono for the home team.
The home team replace Ruben Rochina with Jorge De Frutos Sebastian.
Levante have been awarded a corner by Mario Melero Lopez.
In the minute 86, Goal kick for Celta Vigo at Estadio de la Ceramica.
Brais Mendez is on a sub for Santi Mina for Celta Vigo.
Fran Beltran is on a sub for Sergio Carreira Vilarino for Celta Vigo.
In the minute 88, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Levante are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Iago Aspas (Celta Vigo) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Ball goes out of play for a Celta Vigo goal kick.
At Estadio de la Ceramica the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Levante drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Corner awarded to Celta Vigo.
Celta Vigo are pushing forward but Renato Tapia's finish is wide of the goal.
Levante have a goal kick.
Full-time! The final score is 1-1.
